entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Check nullability attributes in conversions of lambdas #56668
    17.1
  • IDE0052 suggests changes that would break the desired behavior of some programs #56666
  • Unskip InitOnlyMemberTests.LateBound tests #56665
  • Unskip GenericAttributeParameter_01 test #56664
  • Add the ability to escape strings with special characters (e.g. quotes) when pasting into Visual Studio. #56661
  • Values in CompilerVisibleProperty containing #s don't transfer to source generators #56656
  • Compiler or analyzer should warn for lower-cased type names #56653
  • Disable redirect when pausing running project #56648
  • While applying lifting for operators involving ref structs, compiler can silently construct invalid Nullable types. #56646
  • String IParameterreferenceOperation and ILocalReferenceOperation are missing in ControlFlowGraph under .NET Framework #56644
  • Deprecate the `-unsafe` compiler switch #56632

Closed

  • Compiler crash in pattern matching lowering - Error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797. (1, 1) #51801
    17.0
  • CS8751 when using ref struct System.Index #52724
    17.0
  • Test plan for "record structs" #51199
    17.0
  • Add support for record structs in CodeLens #52430
    Backlog
  • Non spec-conformant eval order for System.Index Expression #54085
    17.0
  • Test plan for "improved definite assignment" #51463
    17.0
  • WithAsyncKeyword on types derived from AnonymousFunctionExpressionSyntax removes static modifier #54239
    17.0
  • Json source generator corrupts Workspace #56499
    17.0
  • Resolve from NuGet doesn't work #27010
    Backlog
  • NullableReferenceTypes not working with Action and lambda #34612
    Backlog
  • Local function return is confused with primary lambda return in nullability tracker #43071
  • FastUpToDate check always failed on VS2022 with RunAnalyzersDuringBuild=false #56370
    17.0
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to `object` #55923
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Label developer community issues when created #56667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report UseSite diagnostics on user-defined conversions #56663
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix ALC in ProjectReference scenarios #56662
    Area-Compilers
  • Merged PR with all option changes up to now. #56655
    Area-IDE
  • Remove option state that is redundant with existing field #56654
    Area-IDE
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor ClassificationOptions #56633
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56660
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash lowering property pattern where override lacks a get accessor #56586
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56657
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle potentially-null IVsActivityLog #56647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clean up loc strings #56559
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56658
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56651
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement val escape checks for BoundFromEndIndexExpression and BoundRangeExpression nodes. #56652
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56650
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56638
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid unnecessary up-front captures to temps while lowering indexer access that uses “Index Pattern” #56611
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix WithAsyncKeyword to not drop existing modifiers #54240
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Don't inline lightbulb actions if the total count would be too high #56634
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56640
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow user to change the nuget.org feed name without breaking Nuget suggestions #56606
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56637
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56627
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to object #56567
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56669
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Update references for public 17.0 Preview 4 release #56626
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle operators when rewriting expression trees #56598
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Method type inference should make inference from explicit lambda return type #56534
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Create misc files workspace for LSP #56314
    Area-IDE
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE
  • Make 'Languages' not part of hte state of an optionset #56489
    Area-IDE
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Add checklist entry for templates to compiler test plan #56562
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56476
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
